img_above_text:
![Wukong Brook 26.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f4/Wukong_Brook_26.jpg)
This limbs will often glow after he expels energy around him in a damaging wave. Some will start a longer combo move, while others can be a single strike, like leaping into the air to smash down with two glowing fists.
img_below_text:
Another can be done at range, so even if you think you're at a safe distance, be ready to dodge if he adopts a stance and then dashes up for a glowing elbow strike attack.
![Wukong Brook 28.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/75/Wukong_Brook_28.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

This limbs will often glow after he expels energy around him in a damaging wave. Some will start a longer combo move, while others can be a single strike, like leaping into the air to smash down with two glowing fists."
            - Following Text: "Another can be done at range, so even if you think you're at a safe distance, be ready to dodge if he adopts a stance and then dashes up for a glowing elbow strike attack.
![Wukong Brook 28.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/75/Wukong_Brook_28.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dynamic scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a character executing a powerful attack move. The character is seen leaping into the air, preparing to smash down with glowing fists, indicating a high-energy combat moment. This visual aligns with the preceding text describing the character's ability to expel energy in damaging waves and perform combo moves. The snowy environment and visible health bar suggest an intense battle scenario, emphasizing the need for players to anticipate and dodge incoming attacks.
